title: Pixel video recording errors, and camera app crashing
content:
Video recording isn't working on my Pixel XL - I have errors like "something went wrong.. part of the recording may be missing", "audio isn't working", and the camera app is very sluggish. It also crashes the phone now
I have tried:
Safe mode - has the same results
Clearing data and cache
Another camera app - open camera - this also crashes after a 5-minute recording

What do we think - hardware or software?
